issue.title: [Java] Add JSON support for dictionary vectors
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-693](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-693). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will enable integration testing

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-693?focusedCommentId=15987319) by Jingyuan Wang (alphalfalfa):*
i'll claim this one

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-693?focusedCommentId=16021994) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Hi `[~jiyuan]`, have you been able to start on this at all?  It would be great to get this in for the next Arrow release, I could help on this too if needed.  Thanks!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-693?focusedCommentId=16023078) by Jingyuan Wang (alphalfalfa):*
`[~bryanc]`, I am so sorry for not being able to start on this. I probably won't have time for the next ~10 days. I've unassigned myself.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-693?focusedCommentId=16023239) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
No problem `[~alphalfalfa]`, I'll give it a shot so we can try to get this in the next release.  Thanks!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-693?focusedCommentId=16074097) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 752
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/752>
